## EvaluateScriptRequest.instanceId property

Optionally identifies the instance in which the script shall be evaluated

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
instanceId?: string;
```

## Remarks

This property shall be specified to use a specific `this` binding during script evaluation.

When not specified, a temporary `this` binding is used for each evaluation.
